about_the_game:
• Don't Click in The Dark

is a unique strategy game that blends clicker elements with a world inspired by the dark mythology of H.P. Lovecraft. The game immerses you in a gloomy, atmospheric environment where the boundaries between reality and dark mysteries are blurred. You assume the role of an enlightened cultist who has glimpsed terrifying truths lying beyond our world. Your objective in the game is to create a cult that extends its tentacles of influence across the globe, worshipping ancient, cosmic deities beyond human comprehension. Undoubtedly, the power of these gods is irresistible, as you will discover as you progress through the game.

  • Unfolding Complexity

The adventure begins with simple clicks, but as you delve deeper, the complexity of the game gradually unfolds. Each click is not merely an action, but a step towards expanding the influence of your cult across the world. With each click, you gain new followers, drawn by promises of power and forbidden knowledge. These followers generate gold - the lifeblood of your cult's expansion. Gold can be exchanged for various upgrades and structures, each playing a role in strengthening your position. From temples that increase followers' devotion to secret libraries unlocking forbidden knowledge. However, as your power grows, so does the risk. The strange beings you summon are volatile and unpredictable. One wrong move, and the entities you thought you controlled may slip out of your grasp, threatening everything you’ve carefully built.

  • Key Mechanics

The game offers a wide range of mechanics that immerse players in the dark and mysterious world of cult management. Key mechanics include:
Managing Cult Branches: Construct buildings, place relics, and upgrade your main cultist or summoned entities. These branches are central to your expansion strategy, as they allow you to recruit new cultists and send out expeditions.
Expeditions: Discover new locations and acquire valuable relics that strengthen your cult. The relics you obtain can be used in branches or shrines, spreading their power throughout your domain.
Summoning Temple: Offer prayers to summon various familiars. The type of familiar you summon is entirely up to you. Each new familiar can become a powerful ally in your path to expansion, but remember that this sword may have two edges.
Achievement Card System: Unlock new buffs that enhance your abilities and influence. You can also upgrade your cultist by purchasing various enhancements based on the experience gained in the game.

  • The Ultimate Question

Will you be able to convince the entire world to worship the ancient gods and ascend to another dimension? Test your skills as a strategist and cult leader in "Don't Click in The Dark."

content_descriptors.notes:
"Don't Click in The Dark" contains mature themes and content that may not be suitable for all audiences. This includes:

Dark and Psychological Themes: The game explores elements of cosmic horror, cult rituals, and the psychological effects of encountering otherworldly beings.
Violence: Some scenes depict ritualistic sacrifices and other forms of violence, often in a stylized pixel art format.
Occult References: The game heavily features references to Lovecraftian mythology, including ancient gods, rituals, and dark magic.
Disturbing Imagery: Players may encounter unsettling visuals and scenarios that are intended to evoke fear and unease.
